subject: How to use pagecontext in a class
msgSnippet: Hello, I would like to use Junit to test my Web app, or plus exactly my classes used in my WebApp. but lots of my classes use a object which use Pagecontext in
messageBody:
Hello,

I would like to use Junit to test my Web app, or plus exactly my
classes used in my WebApp.

but lots of my classes use a object which use Pagecontext in its
constructor.

How can I test my classes ,
Is there any jsp testrunner or something like that ?

thanks
Marc
